Entries.default: The mountain pass ahead of you is blocked by a group of flame nāga.
The nāga prepare for a fight.
The basking nāga are no more the wiser as you sneak up near them.
As you're sneaking up to the nāga, one of them raises its head and looks quickly around before locking eyes with you. It hisses loudly, rousing the other nāga as they prepare to fight.

As you're sneaking up to the nāga, one of them raises its head and looks directly at [SkillCheck 0]. It hisses loudly, rousing the other nāga as they slither forward. They haven't appeared to have noticed anyone else.
[Use the distraction caused by [SkillCheck 0] to escape.]
Upon noticing you, the nāga halt for a moment before pressing forward.
You flee the scene as you hear [SkillCheck 0] make a brave - but ultimately futile - last stand.
You close in on the unaware nāga.
